FridgeBlock:0.Description: A high-tech item that can be used to freeze items, to achieve the effect of refrigeration, refrigerated items can be put into a furnace to remelt.

FrozenBirdBlock:0.Description: A frozen food will preserve your items better, it will continue to melt and become raw, please keep them well, they will last longer for you.

FrozenMeatBlock:0.Description: A frozen food will preserve your items better, it will continue to melt and become raw, please keep them well, they will last longer for you.

FrozenFishBlock:0.Description: A frozen food will preserve your items better, it will continue to melt and become raw, please keep them well, they will last longer for you.

CookedBirdBlock:0.Description: Cooked bird meat. Very tasty and nutritious meal.
CookedBirdBlock:0.CRDescription:0: Cook raw bird to increase its nutritional value and make it preserve better

CookedMeatBlock:0.Description: Cooked meat. A very tasty and nutritious meal.
CookedMeatBlock:0.CRDescription:0: Cook raw meat to increase its nutritional value and make it preserve better

CookedFishBlock:0.Description: Cooked fish. A very tasty and nutritious meal.

FrozenPumpkinBlock:0.Description: A frozen food will preserve your items better, it will continue to melt and become raw, please keep them well, they will last longer for you.

PumpkinBlock:0.Description: Pumpkins are large, orange vegetables that grow in groups of 5 to 10 plants. When collected, they can be eaten, cooked into pumpkin soup or crafted into Jack O'Lanterns.
